definition: 100 ml/one-tenth of a peck/measure for dry grain equal to one-tenth of sheng 升 or liter, or one-hundredth dou 斗
to close/to join/to fit/to be equal to/whole/together/round (in battle)/conjunction (astronomy)/1st note of pentatonic scale/old variant of 盒[he2]
labor contract/contract between employer and employees governing wages and conditions
a deal where the parties collude to sign an under-the-table "yin contract" 陰合同|阴合同 as well as an ostensibly genuine "yang contract" 陽合同|阳合同 in order to deceive authorities

sentences.english: Perfecting the contract text and avoid legal loss.
sentences.chinese: 完善合同文本，避免法律损失。

sentences.english: Medical service contract is a kind of contract for commission.
sentences.chinese: 医疗服务合同具有委托合同的基本属性。

sentences.english: Medical service contract is a kind of contract for commission.
sentences.chinese: 医疗服务合同具有委托合同的基本属性。

sentences.english: Continuously track and monitor key contract clauses for risks and mitigations.
sentences.chinese: 对合同的特别条款进行有效跟踪。

sentences.english: The contract was declared null and void.
Have reached a shopping direction, sales and customers purchase contract signed.
sentences.chinese: 已达成购物方向后，销售人员和客户签署购销合同。

sentences.english: A contract laborer works in Vishakapatnam, India.
sentences.chinese: 在印度维沙卡帕特南工作的一名合同工。

sentences.english: Read your software contracts, and make sure you understand your licensing rights.
sentences.chinese: 仔细阅读软件合同，确保你明白了享有的许可权。

sentences.english: We'd like to discuss the details of the contract, especially discrepancy and claim.
sentences.chinese: 我们想讨论合同的各项细目，特别是差异和索赔。

sentences.english: Canceling or not bidding on selected projects or contracts.
sentences.chinese: 取消或者不竞标被选定的项目或合同。

sentences.english: We need to modify the fifth article of the contract.
sentences.chinese: 合同书的第五条第一款要改一下。

sentences.english: The specific methods for calculating net selling amount and Royalty are detailed in Appendix3 to the Contract.
sentences.chinese: 净销售额和提成费的具体计算方法详见本合同附件三。

sentences.english: A business that contracts to work with another business.
sentences.chinese: 签订合同与另一公司合作的公司。

sentences.english: Please indicate the consignor and consignee in the contract.
sentences.chinese: 请在合同中注明发货方及收货方。

sentences.english: Obligation followed is a very living factor in the space of contract world.
sentences.chinese: 附随义务是合同世界里十分活跃的因素。

sentences.english: So the owner must pay attention to this, to control cost in construction stage consciously.
sentences.chinese: 工程结算支付是承包工程合同管理的核心。

definition: to fall due (loan etc)/to expire (visa etc)/to mature (investment bond etc)
to renew or extend a contract
to agree to and sign (a treaty etc)
to sign one's name/visa/variant of 籤|签[qian1]
inscribed bamboo stick (used in divination, gambling, drawing lots etc)/small wood sliver/label/tag
to terminate an agreement/to cancel a contract
to break a promise/breach of contract
